summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4842 for the improvement of the alley in blocks 88 to 91, inclusive, Woodlawn Addition to Green Lake, being the alley between Latona Avenue and 4th Avenue Northeast, from Woodlawn Avenue to East 65th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55753, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
